primary_diagnosis.description: Major depressive disorder, recurrent, moderate episode
primary_diagnosis.justification: Clinical entity extraction confirms a history of *Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder* without any manic or hypomanic episodes. The recent initiation of *Sertraline* 4 weeks ago and reported ongoing, impactful symptoms confirm the presence of a current episode, appropriately classified as moderate severity based on the provider's direct feedback.
dsm_criteria_met: Meets criteria for Major Depressive Episode (A1-A9, implied by current symptoms/treatment)
Recurrent status (history of two or more episodes confirmed)
No history of mania or hypomania (E criteria met)

ruled_out.reason: History confirms multiple prior episodes, necessitating the recurrent specifier (F33.x).
The patient explicitly denies any history of manic or hypomanic episodes, ruling out Bipolar I or Bipolar II Disorder.
